me sandaha panath ketumpath thunak ketumpath kirimata kabinat mandalaye anumathaya labaganimata wishayabara amathi janaka bandara thennakon mahatha sudanamin siti.methek palath palana nithi paddhathiye thibu durwalatha ha yalpana giya swabhawaya hethuwen pana nangi athi prashnawalata wisandum labaganimata palath palana aayathana walin saha mahajanathawa wisin idiripath kala yojana kerehi wishesha awadhanaya yomu kota ihatha panath thuna sandaha sanshodhana sakaskirimata piyawara gath bawa da amathi janaka bandara thennakon mahatha pawasiya.me sanshodhana mangin samaja, aarthika, sanwardhanaya, parisara sanrakshanaya saha salasumkaranaya pilibandawa palath palana aayathanawalata wadima wagakimak pawarena lesa nawa widhi widhana athulath kara athi bawa da amathiwaraya kiya.
aththata ma gayakayekge samaja wagakima manawin itu karapu kenek thamayi kapuge..

pituwath “podi man “ mallige hithawantha kamath ekkama me wadeta ekathu wuna ...madhushani gana lowa pura pathiruna ...hama predshayakinma ayage ginumata mudal gala aawa ..samahara parithyagashilin kihipawarak mudal parithyaga karala thibuna .., samahara mithuran thamange rakiya sthana wala mudal ek ras karamin ee siyalla ginumata ewwa ..samahara mithuriyan pansale , daham pasale thanin thani awidimin mudal ek ras karamin ,mita dayaka wuna ....dawasen dawasa ginume sheshaya ihala giya ..awashya wana rupiyal 220,000.00 tiken tika lanwuna ..sathi dekak athulatha awashya mudalatath wada wadi mudalak eka ras wuna ...dan ayata prathikaraya laba dima gana kisima bayak naha ....ee witharak noweyi eeta pasu sidu karana parikshana saha athireka aushadha laba gannatath awashya tharamata dan mudal labila thibenawa ...me liyana awasthawa wana witath mudal labemin pawathina bawath dana gannata labuna , sampurna mudal thathwaya gana me satahane awasanayata liyannam , mokada me satahana liyana dan welawa lankawe welawen nam ude 11yi ...ada hawasa hatharata thamayi mulu ekathuwa laba gannata hakiwanne ...
